member.name: T:Ninject.Conditions.Builders.TerminatingCondition`2
member.summary: A condition that takes the input of a chain of converter delegates and passes the result to a predicate delegate, determining the result of the condition. This class supports Ninject's EDSL and should generally not be used directly.

The subject type that this condition will examine.

member.summary: Creates a new TerminatingCondition.

member.name: T:Ninject.Conditions.When
member.summary: The root type for Ninject's EDSL (embedded domain-specific language). This is most commonly used from within s.
member.remarks: This type can be used as a shortcut to creating complex conditional statements that examine objects. This type can also be extended to customize the EDSL.

member.name: P:Ninject.Conditions.When.Context
member.summary: Begins a conditional chain that examines an activation context.

member.name: P:Ninject.Conditions.When.Request
member.summary: Begins a conditional chain that examines an intercepted message call.
